scripts.build:vector: bun build:mdx && cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python vector_db_builder.py --html-dir html --output-dir vector_db && deactivate
scripts.build:vector:clean: bun build:mdx && cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && python vector_db_builder.py --clean --html-dir html --output-dir vector_db && deactivate
scripts.buildAndPush: bun build:vector && bun build:next && bun docker:push && bun rag:push
scripts.check: bun depcheck && bun prettier && bun eslint && bun tsc && bun rag:lint
scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg VERSION=$npm_package_version --build-arg GIT_COMMIT=$(git show --no-patch --format=%h) --build-arg BUILD_DATE=`date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"` . -t geoffreychallen/www:latest && bun docker:tag
scripts.docker:push: docker buildx build . --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8 --builder multiplatform --tag geoffreychallen/www:latest --tag geoffreychallen/www:$npm_package_version --push
scripts.k8s:restartDev: kubectl rollout restart deployment dev-geoffreychallen-com-deployment -n geoffreychallen
scripts.k8s:restartRAG: kubectl rollout restart deployment rag-geoffreychallen-com-deployment -n geoffreychallen
scripts.k8s:restartWeb: kubectl rollout restart deployment www-geoffreychallen-com-deployment -n geoffreychallen
scripts.k8s:setVersion: kubectl set image deployment/www-geoffreychallen-com-deployment www-geoffreychallen-com=geoffreychallen/www:$npm_package_version -n geoffreychallen && kubectl set image deployment/rag-geoffreychallen-com-deployment rag-server=geoffreychallen/rag-server:$npm_package_version -n geoffreychallen
scripts.prebuild: bun build:mdx && tsx bin/rss.ts && tsx bin/pyodide.ts && esbuild --bundle onload.ts --outfile=public/onload.js
scripts.prettier: prettier --cache -w --plugin=prettier-plugin-organize-imports . && prettier-package-json --write && cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && ruff format . && deactivate
scripts.rag:build: bun build:vector && cd rag && docker build -t geoffreychallen/rag-server:latest -t geoffreychallen/rag-server:$npm_package_version .
scripts.rag:dev: cd rag && docker compose --profile dev up rag-server-dev
scripts.rag:lint: cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check . && deactivate
scripts.rag:ncu: cd rag && source venv/bin/activate && pip-review --local && deactivate
scripts.rag:push: bun build:vector && cd rag && docker buildx build . --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64/v8 --builder multiplatform --tag geoffreychallen/rag-server:latest --tag geoffreychallen/rag-server:$npm_package_version --push
scripts.rag:run: cd rag && docker compose up rag-server
